arts.ttl: Arsenal closer to Gyokeres signing as Man Utd pull out
arts.sum: Viktor Gyokeres has moved a step closer to joining Arsenal this summer after Man Utd pulled out of the race for the Sweden star. Correio da Manha reports that Berta played a "decisive role" in the convincing Gyokeres to join Arsenal over multiple other top European clubs such as Man Utd, Barcelona, Chelsea and Newcastle.

arts.ttl: Not Osimhen or Gyokeres: Man United have a new number one striker target
arts.sum: Manchester United are focused on signing a new striker in the summer transfer window. Previous signings, such as Rasmus Hojlund and Joshua Zirkzee, have not met expectations, forcing the club to seek alternatives in the market. Both the current United attackers have scored 6 Premier League goals combined this season, proving how desperate they are […] The post Not Osimhen or Gyokeres: Man United have a new number one striker target appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Braga hold Sporting to 1-1 draw at Alvalade
arts.sum: Sporting failed in their attempt to reclaim top spot in the Primeira Liga, drawing 1-1 at home to Braga, thus enabling Benfica to go two points clear at the summit with six matches remaining in the 2024/25 season. The Lions started strongly, Viktor Gyökeres scoring directly from a free kick after earlier having a goal ruled out because he was three centimetres offside. The domination of the home team subsided as Braga came back into it, but with time ticking away it seemed Sporting would hold on until late substitute Afonso Patrão headed in a dramatic equaliser in the 87th minute. The point is enough for Braga to overtake Porto and move up to third place in the league, while Sporting must now play catchup against city rivals Benfica. arts.ttl: EXCLUSIVE: Amorim makes Inacio demand and picks surprise Mainoo replacement
arts.sum: FootballTransfers understands that Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim wants a new centre-back this summer in a move that could heavily influence Lisandro Martinez's career at Old Trafford. The expectation would be for Man Utd to dip into the market for a more natural midfielder should they indeed sell Mainoo this summer.

arts.ttl: Viktor Gyokeres agent 'to attend Champions League quarter-final' amid Arsenal, PSG transfer speculation
arts.sum: The agent of Sporting Lisbon striker Viktor Gyokeres is reportedly set to attend a blockbuster Champions League quarter-final this week amid increasing speculation.

arts.ttl: Man United transfer news: Red Devils 'enter race' for Arsenal-linked Matheus Cunha
arts.sum: Manchester United allegedly become the latest Premier League club to identify a versatile Premier League attacker as a summer transfer target.

arts.ttl: Max Johnston wanted for Braga transfer as former Motherwell kid sees Champions League chance emerge
arts.sum: Johsnton left the Steelmen for Sturm Graz in 2023 and made his senior Scotland debut against Greece last month
